briefTitle: Study of SkQ1 as Treatment for Dry-eye Syndrome

outcomeMeasures.title: Central Corneal Staining Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change of Corneal Fluorescein Staining from baseline to Day 57, scale ranges from 0 to 4, where grade 0 = None, 4 = Severe

outcomeMeasures.title: Grittiness Change From Baseline
outcomeMeasures.description: Change of patient-reported grittiness from baseline to Day 57, scale ranges from 0 to 5 for each symptom, where 0 = None and 5 = Worst
